song.info:
___\_ / _____ __\\_ \_ _____ __\\_ \_ ___ _ __/ //_____ _) / /_\\_ \_ / // //_ / // _//_____ _/ (_ \ / / / / / \ _/ _ / \_ / \ / /________/ _ /___\______\ \____\____\ / /_____\_____\ - -diP-_ ______\____\-----_ __________\-----_ ___________\-bM!------ - V A N T A G E
presents
2600 (final release)
a 4k intro for the atari 2600
released 2004 at buenzli 1337
code::moerder music::decybel
thanks to paul slocum for his musickit 2.
---
if you have the possibility, watch it on real hardware. the music will sound much better than on emulators.
the best atari 2600 emulator is z26: http://www.whimsey.com/z26/z26.html
when watching the intro with z26 you should supply the -f switch, like this:
z26 2600.bin -f
while the intro is running, the bw/color switch (F3/F4 in z26) toggles between PAL/NTSC mode. reset (F1 in z26) restarts the intro.
